description.value:
The shaman’s body thickens and becomes more muscular. For the purpose of the overrun combat maneuver, she treats her shaman level as her base attack bonus when calculating her CMB and CMD.

At 7th level, the shaman gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.go4xOiSUP8R1QJ5N]{Improved Overrun} as a bonus feat.

At 11th level, the shaman gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.tkWfEP1fD7CZt8Kw]{Greater Overrun} as a bonus feat.

The shaman doesn’t need to meet the prerequisites of these feats.
